chain 3 s are turning chains and are not included in the stitch count ● crochet over the long turning chains when joining the two sides together ● to make it longer work 12 more row or use a larger hook the bumps are worked in multiples of 4 row and the scratchy side is worked in multiples of 3 row so 12 is the least common denominator ● to make it wider or narrower chain in multiples of 4+3
